- **Key Count**: [e.g., 67]
- **Layout Type**: [e.g., 65%, TKL, Full-size, Ortholinear]
- **Board ID** (if known): [e.g., from Connect page]

## Keyboard Photo

If possible, attach a photo of your keyboard to help verify the layout accuracy.

## Notes

- Special key arrangements
- Non-standard key sizes
- Variations or revisions

## Verification

- [ ] I have tested this layout with my physical keyboard
- [ ] The key positions match the actual keyboard layout
- [ ] I have exported this using the Layout Creator's "Compact Code Format"
